timeline.message:
Added a note about downgrades

Added a note making it clearer that downgrades are not supported, and the workaround of a snapshot restore.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            In-place Downgrades from any version to an earlier version are not supported.  You can restore a Snapshot taken prior to an upgrade to a Cluster running the pre-upgrade version to workaround this limitation.
          
          
            
            [IMPORTANT]
          
          
            
            ====
          
          
            
            In-place downgrades to earlier versions are not supported. To downgrade to an
          
          
            
            earlier version, <<snapshots-restore-snapshot,restore a snapshot>> taken prior
          
          
            
            to the version upgrade.
          
          
            
            ====
timeline.author: jrodewig
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -51,6 +51,8 @@ The following upgrade paths are *not* supported:
 
 * 6.8 to 7.0.
 * 6.7 to 7.1.–{version}.
+
+In-place Downgrades from any version to an earlier version are not supported.  You can restore a Snapshot taken prior to an upgrade to a Cluster running the pre-upgrade version to workaround this limitation.
